brief.brief: A description of the actions taken.

detail.detail: Service Manager uses this field to get update information (corrective action text) from the user.
If Journaling is enabled, Service Manager displays the text entered in this field on the Journal Updates tab.

If Activities is enabled, Service Manager displays the text entered in this field as an activity record on the Historic Activities tab (assuming there is a line item for this field in the activityactions table).
